tasks.intent_template: Create a file named '{file}' in the folder '{folder}' with the content '{content}' and set the permissions of the file to '{file_permission}' and the permissions of the folder to '{folder_permission}'.

import os
import shutil
from pathlib import Path

Path("tmp").mkdir(parents=True, exist_ok=True)
with open("tmp/test.txt", "w") as f:
    f.write("Hello World!")
os.chmod("tmp/test.txt", int("0o644", 8))
os.chmod("tmp", int("0o775", 8))

import os
import shutil
from pathlib import Path

if os.path.exists("tmp") and os.path.isdir("tmp"):
    shutil.rmtree("tmp")
